sentences.sContent: Divers hope to salvage some of the ship’s cargo.
sentences.sCn: 潜水员希望能够抢救出船上部分货物。

synos.tran: 打捞；[水运][安全]海上救助；抢救财货；救难的奖金

phrases.pCn: 海难救助作业，救助作业；财产抢救；补救手术

words.tran: 可抢救的；可打捞的；可挽回的；能利用的
救苦救难的；有意救人的

trans.tranOther: to save something from an accident or bad situation in which other things have already been damaged, destroyed, or lost
when you save things from a situation in which other things have already been damaged, destroyed, or lost
